titles.title: Waiving certain points of order against the bill (H.R. 4554) making appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1995, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-548, by Mr. Derrick.
Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4554. Certain points of order against provisions of the bill are waived. Measure will be read by paragraph. Bill is open to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 174.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/15/1994--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of H.R. 4554 (FY 1995 appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, the Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs).
